title: Cardboard
description: Cardboard is a recyclable material used for packaging.

title: Glass
description: Glass can be recycled endlessly without loss in quality.
instructions: Rinse the glass to remove any residue

title: Aluminium
description: Aluminium can be recycled endlessly without loss in quality.
instructions: Rinse the aluminium to remove any residue
Do not mix with other metals

title: Plastic
description: Plastic is a versatile material that can be recycled into various products.
instructions: Rinse the plastic to remove any residue
Do not mix with non-recyclable plastics

title: Electronics
description: Electronics contain valuable materials that can be recycled.
instructions: Take to a certified e-waste recycler

title: Food Waste
description: Food waste can be composted to create nutrient-rich soil.

title: Metal
description: Metal can be recycled indefinitely without losing its properties.
instructions: Remove any paint or chemical residues
Do not mix with non-metal materials

title: Textiles
description: Textiles can be recycled into new fabrics or other products.
instructions: Ensure textiles are clean and dry

title: Wood
description: Wood can be recycled into mulch, compost, or new wood products.
instructions: Remove any paint or chemical treatments
Do not mix with treated wood

title: Flexible Plastics
description: Flexible plastics can be recycled into new plastic products.
instructions: Do not mix with non-plastic materials
